titleStmt.title: The enquirie and verdite of the quest panneld of the death of Richard Hune wich was founde hanged in Lolars tower

notesStmt.note: At end: Subscribed in this maner Thomas Barnewell Crawner of the citie of London.
Destroyed; preserved on UMI microfilm reel 53.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
